nodes.text: The Cato Neimoidia system was a star system located in the Quellor sector of the Colonies region. It contained the planet Cato Neimoidia and its two moons, which orbited the star Neri, and sat at N-11 on the Standard Galactic Grid. One of the three Purse Worlds, Cato Neimoidia served as the headquarters of the Trade Federation.
